name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in creating high-performance applications using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Spring Batch** for robust backend solutions. My skills extend to **ETL** processes, including efficient **file parsing** and data transformation, ensuring seamless data integration. Proficient in **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, I leverage the best data storage techniques to enhance application performance.

Additionally, I have experience with **Docker** for containerization and **Kafka** for building real-time data pipelines, which empowers applications to handle significant data loads with high reliability. My strong foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems ensures my solutions are scalable and maintainable.

I have a track record of developing enterprise-grade applications with compliance to industrial standards and a solid understanding of technical English for effective communication. My background in integrating cloud solutions and automation practices further enhances my capabilities in delivering quality software.
